1.title: Ballet Auditions Day 1
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Ballet Auditions Day 2
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: The Ballet Solo
3.plot: The group begins rehearsals for their first big competition just a few weeks away, while Kate and Lauren go head to head for the lead solo part in the ensemble routine.

4.title: Ballet Boys
4.plot: After much deliberation, Matthew and Max reveal which dancer- Lauren or Kate- landed the solo part for the competition. Meanwhile, the boys in the Joffrey Elite are struggling to learn the intense choreography.

5.title: The Final Ballet Rehearsal
5.plot: Tensions are high within Joffrey Elite during the final rehearsal before their first competition. The boys are still struggling with their partnering skills, and Harrison's position on the team is in jeopardy after missing several classes at school. Will the team be ready to compete next week?

6.title: Ballet Competition Part 1
6.plot: Competition day is here. It is the first time the Joffrey Elite is competing together as a team and nerves are high. Will Kate's solo in the group number lead the team to success?

7.title: Ballet Competition Part 2
7.plot: After weeks of rehearsal, the Joffrey Elite take the stage to perform their group number. Many of them have never competed before. With nerves running high, tune in to see how they do at their first competition.

8.title: Everybody Hurts!
8.plot: A New York City blizzard won't stop the Joffrey Elite- the students trek through the snow for their first rehearsal back after the Bounce. Competition. Matthew and Max have notes for the team about their performance and must deliver some unfortunate news to one of the dancers.

9.title: Love Is in the Air
9.plot: It is Valentine's Day and love is in the air as the Joffrey Elite team learns a new routine for their next competition.

10.title: The Ballet Duets
10.plot: The dancers find out which girls will be featured in the duets with Harrison for the upcoming "Love" routine. Matthew introduces a second group number, a classical on pointe piece, which the dancers will also be performing at the next competition.

11.title: Ballet Birthdays!
11.plot: After rehearsing both group numbers for the upcoming Beyond the Stars competition, the dancers head out to celebrate Maddie and Niamh's birthdays.

12.title: The Pointe of Ballet
12.plot: It is the final rehearsal for the Joffrey Elite before the Beyond the Stars competition. As they are finishing the choreography, one of the dancers gets injured and the alternate has to take his spot. Will the team be ready to compete next week?

13.title: Beyond the Stars Competition - Part 1
13.plot: Competition day is finally here and nerves are high. The Joffrey Elite team takes the stage to perform the Fantasy piece on pointe. Tune in to see how they do.

14.title: Beyond the Stars Competition - Part 2
14.plot: The Joffrey Elite is ready to take the stage to perform their second number, Still I Cry, at Beyond the Stars Competition. Tune in to see how they place during the awards ceremony.

15.title: The Rules of Ballet
15.plot: There are consequences for every action - tune in as the coaches must deliver some harsh news to one of the Joffrey Elite dancers.

16.title: The New Ballet Boy
16.plot: After losing a team member last week, Matthew and Max hold auditions for a new boy to join the Joffrey Elite team.

17.title: The Emotions of Ballet
17.plot: The Joffrey Elite girls get very emotional as they compete for the two lead parts in the upcoming group number.

18.title: The Surprise Ballet Guest
18.plot: A star in the ballet world, Amar Ramasar, stops by the studio to observe the Joffrey Elite perform their group number for the upcoming competition.

19.title: The Ballet Photoshoot
19.plot: A pair of photographers drops by the studio to shoot the Joffrey Elite team as they run through their final rehearsal in New York before they compete in LA.

20.title: Bella Moxi Competition- Part 1
20.plot: The Joffrey Elite has landed in sunny Los Angeles and they are ready to take the stage for Madison's choreographed routine.

21.title: The Final Performance
21.plot: It's time for the Joffrey Elite to take the stage in LA to perform their group piece and for Anna to wow the judges with her Black Swan solo. Tune in to see if they win big during the award ceremony.

locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: In this series, we follow ten Joffrey students who have been selected for the highly intensive Joffrey Elite group after a grueling and competitive audition process. As members of the Joffrey Elite, we will chronicle the day-to-day lives of these teenage dancers as they balance their schoolwork with long rehearsal days to prepare for competitions and nationals. These teenagers are thrust into the wildly competitive world of ballet where they will perfect their craft as young performers. Living together in the school dormitories and rehearsing under rigorous deadlines, this group of elite teen dancers will immediately form lasting friendships with each other. Set in the bustling backdrop of New York City, this groundbreaking series will tell the diverse and compelling stories of this team of young Big Apple transplants who all share the same life-long dream- to become a professional dancer.
imdb.title: Joffrey Elite
plot: In this series, we follow ten Joffrey students who have been selected for the highly intensive _Joffrey Elite_ (qv) group after a grueling and competitive audition process. As members of the _Joffrey Elite_ (qv), we will chronicle the day-to-day lives of these teenage dancers as they balance their schoolwork with long rehearsal days to prepare for competitions and nationals. These teenagers are thrust into the wildly competitive world of ballet where they will perfect their craft as young performers. Living together in the school dormitories and rehearsing under rigorous deadlines, this group of elite teen dancers will immediately form lasting friendships with each other. Set in the bustling backdrop of New York City, this groundbreaking series will tell the diverse and compelling stories of this team of young Big Apple transplants who all share the same life-long dream- to become a professional dancer.
